markdownRemark.excerpt: One of the coolest shows we’ve done in EMPAC so far, an evening of experimental electronic jamming with a boiler-room format. I was glad to finally feature…
markdownRemark.html: One of the coolest shows we’ve done in EMPAC so far, an evening of experimental electronic jamming with a boiler-room format. I was glad to finally feature something using the APC 40 controller.

frontmatter.title: Thoughts on the state of the manufacturing industry from IMTS
